name: Poison
description:
A game made with RPG Maker MV

Music made by me, sound effects are the default ones, sprites are the default ones but I edited a few.

! This game has some flashing lights and things that may trigger people with arachnophobia, download the 'safe' version of the game where these things are removed in the 'safe verison' file ( note it may not be perfect so still proceed with a little bit of caution) !
